column4: I cannot mount my raid array by UUID, sudo vol_id -u /dev/device gives me the correct one, but it is not listed in /dev/disk/by-uuid/.
so if i add it to fstab i get mount: special device /dev/disk/by-uuid/48af03d8-d9bf-4d52-bab7-19dde43163d6 does not exist
does « ls -l /dev/disk/by-uuid/ » not show it at all then?
it shows all devices except my raid5 partition
